Text: The Rickshank Rickdemption:  It was written by Mike McMahan and directed by Juan Meza-Leon.

<Text: The Rickshank Rickdemption:  The season three premiere first aired unannounced on Adult Swim in the United States on April 1, 2017 when it was watched by 676,000 American households.>
Triplets:<The Rickshank Rickdemption

--------------------
Text: The Rickshank Rickdemption:  On the first day of its original broadcast, "The Rickshank Rickdemption" was replayed every half hour from 8pm to 12am ET with improved ratings, as a part of Adult Swim's annual April Fools' Day joke.
